extSubtitle.message: Analyze your games from Chess.com with no difficulty

detectingGameState.description: Message shown when detecting game state

notChessSite.message: Visit Chess.com to analyze your games
notChessSite.description: Message shown when not on Chess.com

noGameDetected.message: Start and finish a game to analyze it
noGameDetected.description: Message shown when no chess game is detected

gameDetected.message: Game finished! Click to analyze on Lichess
gameDetected.description: Message shown when a chess game is detected

gameInProgress.message: Wait for the game to finish before analysis
gameInProgress.description: Message shown when a game is in progress

analyzeOnLichess.description: Button text for analyzing on Lichess

goToLichessReview.description: Button text for going to Lichess review from game page

goToChesscom.description: Button text for going to Chess.com

languageSettingsDesc.message: Select your preferred language. The extension will restart to apply changes.

lichessInstantSettingsDesc.message: Open Lichess analysis automatically when a game is finished

notificationsDesc.message: Receive notifications when your game is ready for analysis

autoOpenDesc.message: Automatically open Lichess analysis when a game is completed

injectGoToLichessButton.description: Toggle for injecting the Lichess review button on Chess.com

injectGoToLichessButtonDesc.message: Add a 'Go to Lichess Review' button directly on Chess.com game pages when a game is finished

settingsSaved.description: Message shown when settings are saved

settingsReset.description: Message shown when settings are reset

rateExtension.message: Are you enjoying the extension? Rate it on the Chrome Web Store!

aboutDesc.message: This extension was created to assist you after chess games on Chess.com. It does not aim to provide features that could lead to cheating, and the extension is open source, allowing you to contribute on GitHub. If you have any feature suggestions, feel free to open an issue on the GitHub repository.

featuresToBeAdded.description: Title for the features to be added section

featuresToBeAddedDesc.message: I am working on new features to further improve the extension, such as automatically opening Lichess after the game ends or adding a review button on the screen.
featuresToBeAddedDesc.description: Description for the features to be added section

suggestFeature.message: Do you have a feature suggestion? Open an issue on GitHub :) I would be happy to implement it
